name: Unfair Kaizo
description:
A friend of mine wanted to participate for the first time in a game jam, and so we decided to team up for this project, to help with overscoping and multi-tasking.

This is an unfair platformer, where some blocks are real and some are not.

Controls are: WASD, for moving and dying.

Level Design and Artwork: Volgradoth
Awful Coding and Play Testing: Me! (Glitched Json)

Music used: Failing Defense, by Keven MacLeod (incompetch.com)
